HOME.TITLE: Étudiant en génie mécatronique
HOME.SUBTITLE: Etudiant brésilien en échange en France
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Actuellement en BAC +5 dans l'École Nationale Supérieure de Mécanique et des Microtechniques
HOME.STUDY_DESC: Diplôme en sandwich en génie mécatronique avec UFU (Brésil) et ENSMM (France) avec une spécialisation en robotique
HOME.PROGRAM_DESC: Développeur ayant de l'expérience dans plusieurs domaines de la programmation, y compris le Web, l'analyse de données, la base de données et les microcontrôleurs
HOME.LANGUAGE_DESC: Langue maternelle portugaise. Bonne maîtrise de l'anglais et du français. Apprenez l'espagnol. En cours d'apprentissage d'Espagnol.
HOME.EXP_DESC: Ensemble d'expériences en ingénierie, informatique, simulation et sciences humaines
HOME.NAME: Nom

ACADEMIC.INTRO: Projects developed in the field of mechatronic engineering, mathematics, teaching and psychological support for students.

ACADEMIC.COBEM_PRO: IMPACTS OF THE PROJECT "PRÓ-EXCELÊNCIA" ON THEENGINEERING STUDENTS PERFORMANCES

ACADEMIC.SEMAT_AT: Dinâmica da máquina de Atwood acoplada a um sistema massa-mola
ACADEMIC.SEMAT_PD: Análise de um pêndulo duplo, com abordagem Lagrangiana e método de Runge-Kutta

ACADEMIC.CEEL_PLACE: XVI Conferência de Estudos em Engenharia Elétrica
ACADEMIC.PETMEC: Desenvolvimento de um Injetor Mecanizado para Sistemas Eletroanalíticos
ACADEMIC.BEST: Into the 10% best Students on the Mechatronics Course

ACADEMIC.WIN_COBEN: One of the ten best articles published
ACADEMIC.WIN_PETMEC: Best work on the automation and robotics domain

ACADEMIC.HOOK: Third place at the HOOK - Competition in Biomedical Engineering
ACADEMIC.PROSS_DESC: Projects carried out aiming the reduction of the retention rate in the faculty utilizing educational and psychological techniques.
ACADEMIC.PROCOR_DESC: Orientation of study groups and both development of a virtual library and an applied guide on the subject of Calculus I
ACADEMIC.MONITORIA_DESC: Teacher for six months in each of the following subjects: Transfer of heat, Dynamics, Calculus I, Digital system control

PROFISIONAL.TITLE: Étudiant en génie mécatronique
PROFISIONAL.DESCRIPTION: Development of activities related to mechatronic engineering, programming and automation
PROFISIONAL.HUT_DESC: Automation of simulations of metal components using scripts along with ABAQUS software. Development and manipulation of 3D models and realization of metrological processes
PROFISIONAL.KYROS_DESC: Full Stack Developer focused on Web Development and Robotic Process Automation via machine learning and big data
PROFISIONAL.NUPE_DESC: DEVELOPMENT OF A 3D-PRINTED PORTABLE PLATFORM FOR MECHANIZED HANDLING AND INJECTION OF MICROVOLUMES COUPLED TO ELECTROCHEMICAL DETECTION
PROFISIONAL.WINDOWS: Accustomed to using the Operating System and developing BAT files
PROFISIONAL.LINUX: Experience using Ubuntu and Debian for professional development
PROFISIONAL.OFFICE: Skills with the main tools of the package. Improved practice with excel, word and power point
PROFISIONAL.ADOBE: Use of software for web development, photo editing, PDFs and creation of 3D models
PROFISIONAL.PYTHON: Main programming language. Development of systems back-end using de Flask. Artificial intelligence applications for data processing. Scripts for automating various functions
PROFISIONAL.JAVA: Experience with developing interfaces and back-end using Spring, Maven, Apache and JackRabbit.
PROFISIONAL.C: Experiences mainly focused on the development of embedded systems
PROFISIONAL.MATLAB: Data processing, simulations and creation of interfaces
PROFISIONAL.SQL: Database for application development and optimisation of data filtering to the server
PROFISIONAL.ASM: Experience with projects in embedded systems and logical challenges using the language
PROFISIONAL.ROBOT_ARM: Robotic arm controled by body mouvements
